name_en: Santa Rita Medalla Real Cabernet Sauvign
awards: Wine Spectator : ’06(91 Points, Top 100와인 57위, GREAT BUY 선정), ’05(91 Points), ’04(91 Points, Top 100와인, 49위), - Wine Advocate (Robert Parker) : ’06(87 Points), ’05(87 Points),’03(88 Points), ’00(87 Points), ’99(90 Points), ’98(87 Points) - Wine Enthusiast : ’06(90 Points) - Decanter : ’97 (★★★★), ’93 (★★★★) - KOREA WINE CHALLENGE 2010 GOLD MEDAL : ‘07
Flavor: 입안에서는 부드럽고 잘 익은 탄닌을 느낄 수 있으며 튼튼한 구조감이 입안에서 긴 여운을 남기게 합니다.
